text: Euestola is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Euestola. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Euestola basalis Martins & Galileo, 1997 * Euestola basidensepunctata Breuning, 1943 * Euestola fasciata Martins & Galileo, 1997 * Euestola lineata Martins & Galileo, 1997 * Euestola obliqua Galileo & Martins, 2004 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Euestola
